title: How big can luxury resale get in Asia? - Vogue Business
summary: The article discusses the growing secondhand market for luxury goods in Asia, particularly for platforms like The RealReal, Thredup, and Depop. While these platforms are gaining traction in the West, their adoption in Asia has been slower due to concerns about counterfeiting, social status associated with new goods, and cultural beliefs surrounding used clothing.
official_company_name: The RealReal, Inc., thredUp, Inc., Depop Ltd.
product_or_process: Online platforms for reselling luxury goods
